calibration.facility_specifics.cfel.generate_paths module¶

@author: Manuela Kuhn <manuela.kuhn@desy.de>
Jennifer Poehlsen <jennifer.poehlsen@desy.de>
class calibration.facility_specifics.cfel.generate_paths.GeneratePaths(run_type, measurement, out_base_dir, module, channel, temperature, meas_spec, subdir, meas_in, asic, runs, run_name)[source]¶

Bases: object

gather(base_dir, as_template=False)[source]¶

Generate the gather file path.

Args:
base_dir: Base directory under which the output is stored.
Return:
Gather directory and file name, each as string.
get_layout_versions(base_dir)[source]¶

Detects which file structure version of the raw files.

Args:
base_dir: Base directory under which the raw directory can be
found.
Return:
The preprocess and layout module to use.
join(base_dir, use_xfel_format)[source]¶

Generates the join file path. NOT IMPLEMENTED.

Args:

base_dir: Base directory under which the output is stored. use_xfel_format (bool): If enabled the output is in xfel

format.
Return:
Join directory and file name, each as string.
preproc(base_dir, as_template=False)[source]¶

Generates the preprocessing file path. NOT IMPLEMENTED.

Args:

base_dir: Base directory under which the output is stored. as_template (optional, bool): If enabled the run is kept as a

template instead of being filled in (default: False).
Return:
None, None because preprocessing is not implemented in the CFEL layout.
process(base_dir, use_xfel_format, as_template=False)[source]¶

Generate the process file path.

Args:

base_dir: Base directory under which the output is stored. use_xfel_format (bool): If enabled the output is in xfel format

(not implemented).
as_template (optional, bool): If enabled the channel is kept as a

template instead of being filled in (default: False,

but not implemented here)
Return:
Process directory and file name, each as string.
raw(base_dir, as_template=True, parts=True)[source]¶

Generates raw path.

Args:
base_dir: Base directory under which the raw directory can be
found.
as_template (optional, bool): If enabled the channel is kept as a

template instead of being filled in. (default: True,

but not implemented here)
Return:
Raw directory and file name, each as string. The file name as a wildcard for the channel.
